Klasse Network

java.lang.Object
Network
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class Network extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the entire neural network structure

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Network

      public Network(Network other)
      Makes a deep copy of another Neural network "other"

    • Network

      public Network(Layer[] layers)
      Creates and initializes a new neural network randomly
      Parameter:
      layers - Array of layer configurations

  • Methodendetails

    • loadFromFile

      public static Network loadFromFile(String srcFileName)
      Load a NN from a file

    • randomizeWeights

      public void randomizeWeights()
      Initializes network weights with random values using Xavier/Glorot initialization Implements Xavier/Glorot initialization which helps with: 1. Preventing vanishing/exploding gradients 2. Maintaining appropriate scale of gradients through the network Scale factor is calculated as sqrt(2 / (fan_in + fan_out))

    • mutate

      public void mutate(double probabilityOfMutation, double maxMutationStrength)

    • writeToFile

      public boolean writeToFile(String tarFileName)
      Saves network weights to a file
      Gibt zurück:
      true if save was successful, false otherwise

    • getResult

      public double[] getResult(double[] input)
      Performs forward propagation through the network This function: 1. Propagates input through each layer 2. Applies weights and biases 3. Handles special case for softmax in output layer 4. Applies activation functions 5. Returns final layer output
      Parameter:
      input - Array of input values
      Gibt zurück:
      Array containing output layer activations

    • getWeightClone

      public double[][][] getWeightClone()

    • getLayers

      public Layer[] getLayers()
